original:
The Home Works Forum is a multidisciplinary platform held in Beirut, Lebanon, approximately every two years. It has developed into a prominent venue for research and dialogue concerning cultural practices in the region and beyond.

Umam Documentation & Research operates an exhibition space known as The Hangar, located in Haret Hreik, a suburb in southern Beirut. This space hosts a variety of extensive events that contribute to the cultu
